trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> types to UI Automation.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
The created <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
This <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> remains in memory until the associated <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 이 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> 연결 될 때까지 메모리에 남아 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 소멸 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The same instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> is returned from subsequent calls to this method and calls to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 동일한 인스턴스에 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> 이 메서드에 대 한 후속 호출에서 반환 되 고에 대 한 호출이 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The type of the peer is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A> virtual callback.
trans-unit.target: 피어 형식은에 의해 결정 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A> 가상 콜백 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> does not implement the callback, no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> is created, and this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 더 콜백을 구현 하지 않는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> 만들어지면이 메서드가 반환 하 고 `null`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />; or <see langword="null" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> was not created by the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement(System.Windows.UIElement)" /> method.
Gets the accelerator key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />의 액셀러레이터 키를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey" />.

The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AcceleratorKey" /> that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetAcceleratorKey(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.

Gets the access key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />와 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />의 선택키를 가져옵니다. 이 메서드는 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" />에서 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The access key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />의 컨트롤 형식을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Custom" /> enumeration value.
Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />를 고유하게 식별하는 문자열을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId" />.

The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId" /> that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetAutomationId(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.

Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the bounding rectangle of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />와 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />의 경계 영역을 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that contains the coordinates of the element.

Optionally, if the element is not both a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> and a <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />, this method returns <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 필요에 따라 요소가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> 둘 다 아닌 경우 이 메서드는 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" />를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />의 자식 요소 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
A list of child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> elements.
Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
An <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> string.

Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that represents the clickable space that is on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />와 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />의 클릭 가능한 공간을 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> on the element that allows a click.

The point values are (<see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />) if the element is not both a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> and a <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 요소가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> 둘 중 하나에만 없는 경우 점 값은 (<see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />)입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />의 기능을 설명하는 문자열을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" />.

The string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.HelpText" /> that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetHelpText(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
Typically, the string that returns is the same text that the control provides in the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 문자열을 반환 하는 컨트롤은 도구 설명에 제공 된 텍스트와 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that communicates the visual status of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />의 표시 상태를 나타내는 문자열을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus" />.

The string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.ItemStatus" /> that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetItemStatus(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
For example, the status of a messenger contact can be "Busy" or "Online".
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 "사용 중" 또는 "Online" 메신저 담당자의 상태 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable string that contains the item type that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />가 나타내는 항목 형식이 들어 있는 사람이 인식할 수 있는 문자열을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType" />.

The string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.ItemType" /> that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetItemType(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
String examples are "Mail Message", "Contact", and "Document".

Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the element that is targeted to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />를 대상으로 하는 요소의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy" />.

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the element that is targeted to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
The element targeting the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> can be a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, but it does not have to be.
trans-unit.target: 대상으로 하는 요소는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, 하지만 될 필요는 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: If it is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label.Target%2A> property will automatically set the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.LabeledBy%2A> property as well.
trans-unit.target: 이 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label.Target%2A> 속성은 자동으로 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.LabeledBy%2A> 속성 이름도 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the notification characteristics of the live region of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> object that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />와 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 개체의 라이브 영역의 알림 특성을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLiveSetting" />.
The notification characteristics of the live region.
Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />와 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />의 텍스트 레이블을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.

The string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name" /> that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetName(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name%2A> property functions similar to a string of text that users use to explain the control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name%2A> 에 참조 속성 함수는 사용자가 컨트롤을 설명 하기 위해 사용 하는 텍스트 문자열로 비슷합니다.

trans-unit.source: Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: 모든 컨트롤에 대 한 텍스트 표현이 있는지 확인은 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] 지역화 된 방식으로 컨트롤을 프로그래밍 방식으로 참조할 수 있도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> is laid out in a specific direction.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />가 특정 방향으로 레이아웃되었는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation" />.
The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation.None" /> enumeration value.
A value from the enumeration.
Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />의 컨트롤 패턴을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider" /> interface if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="patternInterface" />가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider" />이면 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> 인터페이스를 구현하는 개체이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="null" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> currently has keyboard input focus.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />와 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />에 현재 키보드 입력 포커스가 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the element has keyboard input focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 요소에 키보드 입력된 포커스가 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않은 경우 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> is an element that contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />이 사용자에게 표시되는 데이터를 포함하는 요소인지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement" />.
<see langword="true" />.

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> is understood by the end user as interactive.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />가 최종 사용자에게 대화형으로 인식되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, the user might understand the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 사용자는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />가 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)]에 있는 컨트롤의 논리 구조에 참여하는 것으로 인식할 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.
<see langword="true" />.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />에서 키보드 포커스를 받을 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable" />.
A <see langword="boolean" /> that contains the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled" />.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />에서 키보드 포커스를 받을 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the element is focusable by the keyboard; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 요소가 키보드 포커스를 받을 수 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />가 화면에서 벗어났는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 요소가 화면에 없으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 요소의 표시 여부를 나타내지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: 일부 경우에는 요소는 화면에 지만 표시 되어 있지 않으면입니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 요소가 다른 요소에 의해 가려진 화면에 표시 되지 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: In this case the method returns `false`.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> contains protected content.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />에 보호된 콘텐츠가 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword" />.
<see langword="false" />.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> is required to be completed on a form.
trans-unit.target: 폼에서 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />를 채워야 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm" />.

A <see langword="boolean" /> that contains the value that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetIsRequiredForForm(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />, if it's set; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetIsRequiredForForm(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />이 설정된 경우 해당 반환 값이 들어 있는 <see langword="boolean" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
Sets the keyboard input focus on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />에 키보드 입력 포커스를 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.
